content: Shares in Bank of the Ozarks  tumbled more than 11 percent on Friday after the company said Dan Thomas had resigned as vice chairman and president of its real estate specialties group and investors worried why he was leaving the company.
name: Bank of the Ozarks
title: Bank of the Ozarks shares tumble after key executive resigns
